ComicInfo.Summary:
Sam Rey fights a battle that takes her through time to keep the villainous pirate October from retrieving the treasure he's crossed oceans to steal.? But the treasure has ideas of its own, and it just might be too big for the both of them...
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-25 07:20:06. [CVDB281623]
